vyRu#ddhaqM ~MvA Eqtad-yaqj~jasyaq yada#yaqjuShkE#Na kriqyata# iqmAma#gRuBNan 
raSaqnA-mRuqtasyEtya#SvABiqdhAnIqmA da#ttEq yaju#ShkRutyai yaqj~jasyaq samRu#ddhyaiq pratU$rtaM ~MvAjiqnnA draqvEtyaSva#maqBi da#dhAti rUqpamEqvAsyaiqtan ma#hiqmAnaqM ~MvyAca#ShTE yuq~jjAthAq(gm)q rAsa#BaM ~Myuqvamiti# gardaqBamasE#tyEqva ga#rdaqBaM prati# ShThApayatiq tasmAqdaSvA$d-gardaqBO&sa#ttarOq yOgE#yOgE taqvasta#raqmityA#haq - [  ] 5
